snippet.title: Restitched - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Restitched follows the story of a brave, adventurous teddy bear named Stuffy on a journey to find their roots. Along the way, Stuffy must 'restitch' a community unravelled by corporate greed and tyranny while discovering new friends, new foes, and new locations.

Music: Everyone Can Feel Alive - KidPenny

#Restitched #Stuffy #TrixelCreative

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1361090/Restitched/

Learn more about Restitched: https://trixelcreative.com/restitched

Join the Trixel Creative Discord for all the latest info: http://discord.gg/q8E2hr4

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrixelCreative
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/trixelcreative
